attributes.action: Change the ruling of the age you can collect your private pension
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government has change the ruling you cannot claim your private pension at the age of 50 unless you reach 50 in 2010.

This is unfair for those who have paid into a private pension and when taking out the policy intended to retire at 50 years of age. The rule should not have been applied to those already paying in to the pension, It is unfair as its not a burden on the UK tax payer. The rules should have applied to new policy's thereafter from when the rule was changed.

When taking out the Policy before the rule change, people took up the policy on that condition of claiming it from the age of 50, So now these people have been fraudulently denied their rights of the terms and conditions of the time they took out their policy. if these people were aware of this, they may have invested their money in some other financial investment scheme, but because they have paid so much into their existing policy they have to keep going with in this new and unfair law created by your labour government. So how can you say Mr Brown you are for the people of this country.
